attributes.action: Ban UK based companies from using out of country call centers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you one of the millions of people who everyday are forced to ring call centers, only to find that you can not understand a word the person on the other end of the line is saying,when you finally get through.Forcing companies to use staff based in the same country would greatly reduce the stress & phone abuse, caused by difficulties understanding the operator,& them understanding your requests.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
